# Dinas Couture

Welcome to the Dinas Couture project! This is a fashion website designed to showcase and sell stylish clothing and accessories. Below you will find information about the project structure, setup instructions, and features.

## Project Structure

```
dinas-couture
├── src
│   ├── index.html          # Main HTML file and entry point for the website
│   ├── css
│   │   ├── styles.css      # Main styles for the website
│   │   └── responsive.css   # Styles for responsive design
│   ├── js
│   │   ├── main.js         # Main JavaScript functionality
│   │   └── cart.js         # Shopping cart functionality
│   ├── assets
│   │   └── fonts           # Custom font files
│   └── pages
│       ├── products.html    # Page displaying products
│       ├── about.html       # Page with brand information
│       └── contact.html      # Contact form or information
├── public
│   └── images              # Directory for image assets
├── package.json            # npm configuration file
├── webpack.config.js       # Webpack configuration file
└── README.md               # Project documentation
```

## Setup Instructions

1. **Clone the repository:**
   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/ifeanyisolomon004-bit/Solomon.git
   cd dinas-couture
   ```

2. **Install dependencies:**
   ```bash
   npm install
   ```

3. **Run the development server:**
   ```bash
   npm start
   ```

4. **Build the project for production:**
   ```bash
   npm run build
   ```

## Features

- **Responsive Design:** The website is designed to be fully responsive, ensuring a great user experience on all devices.
- **Shopping Cart:** Users can easily add and remove items from their shopping cart.
- **Product Pages:** A dedicated page to showcase all available products.
- **About Page:** Information about Dinas Couture, including our mission and values.
- **Contact Page:** A form for users to reach out with inquiries or feedback.

## Contributing

Contributions are welcome! Please feel free to submit a pull request or open an issue for any suggestions or improvements.
